mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_schedule (user_id, schedule_name, start_at, end_at, importance) VALUES (#{userId}, #{scheduleName}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{importance});
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id, user_id, schedule_name, start_at, end_at, importance FROM my_schedule WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId};

SELECT a.apply_id, a.user_id, a.company_name, s.status_id, s.is_progressing, s.current_status, sch.schedule_id, sch.start_date, sch.end_date FROM apply a LEFT JOIN apply_status s ON a.apply_id = s.apply_id LEFT JOIN apply_schedule sch ON a.apply_id = sch.apply_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT a.apply_id, a.user_id, a.company_name, a.company_size, a.job, a.industry, a.created_at, a.updated_at, s.status_id, s.is_progressing, s.current_status, sch.schedule_id, sch.start_date, sch.end_date FROM apply a LEFT JOIN apply_status s ON a.apply_id = s.apply_id LEFT JOIN apply_schedule sch ON a.apply_id = sch.apply_id WHERE a.apply_id = #{applyId} AND a.user_id = #{userId};
